title: Remove Unused Types
description: Identify and remove dead types. Consolidate type guards into single file.

tasks.description: Identify Dead Types - Find types that are exported but never imported elsewhere.
instructions: Run TypeScript compiler with --noUnusedLocals flag
Use grep to find exports and their import sites
Create report of types that are exported but never imported
Mark types for deletion vs preservation
Save report as dead-types-report.json
successCriteria: No false positives (dynamically used types identified)

tasks.description: Remove Dead Types - Delete types identified as unused in previous task.
instructions: Remove dead types from type files
Delete files that become empty after removal
Update barrel exports (index.ts files)
Run npm run typecheck after each batch
Verify no runtime errors

tasks.description: Consolidate Type Guards - Move 85+ type guards into single guards.ts file.
instructions: Identify all type guard functions (isSequentialThought, etc.)
Create src/types/guards.ts with essential guards only
Remove redundant guards (those that can use mode field directly)
Update imports across codebase
Run npm run typecheck

tasks.description: Sprint 8 Verification - Run full test suite, create commit.
instructions: Run npm run typecheck - must pass with 0 errors
Run npm run test:run - all tests must pass
Run npm run build - must complete successfully
Create git commit: 'refactor(v9.0.0): Phase 15C Sprint 8 - Remove Unused Types'
Update this TODO file with actual hours and completion status

notes: Sprint 8 cleans up types that were created but never used. The type guard consolidation reduces 85+ guards to essential ones that can't be replaced by simple mode field checks.
